channel.title: Do you think it's right what Fagex is doing?
channel.description:
Do you people think it's right that Fagex is making all these new password crackers? I mean I auto but whats the point if theres the risk (which is growing) of me getting hacked and losing all my items.
I'm personally against password crackers, yes, I've tried a couple and it takes too long so I quit. But I think it's wrong to hijack another player, that's right up there with identity theft.

item.title: Do you think it's right what Fagex is doing?
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“xerozcheez, post:14, topic:18299”][quote author=ruler link=topic=27334.msg321730#msg321730 date=1160983133]
i do not like fagex, they have removed all posts related to ibot and banned me.

They use to be a good alternative to sythe now they are the worst.
[/quote]
Why did they do that?[/quote]
bc i have a bot and they dont.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think it's right what Fagex is doing?

item.title: Do you think it's right what Fagex is doing?
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

What fagex is doing is just plain noobish. Autoing is one thing, but pass cracking is just plain wrong. I believe autoing is more better type of cheating then pass cracking.

i dont like what fagex haone to rsc all together, i mean like they needed new stuff, there minner had been halted since like the start of may this year… never did continue, there auto fighter is pwnage except it cost and you cant really crack a key if it can be used only once, most of the other stuff i dont like, it was cool how it was, just ad more stuff regulary

~©ristle~

item.title: Do you think it's right what Fagex is doing?
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

I don’t think it’s right, but I admit, I’ve used them… one of my friends hacked me out of 50mill a few months back, and my server wasn’t as popular so I had no a money, these pass crackers seemed like they could get me back the cash I lost, I know it’s not right, but I’m the one gaining items so yeah lol, I know what it’s like to be hacked but it’s their fault for using such easy passwords.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think it's right what Fagex is doing?

item.title: Do you think it's right what Fagex is doing?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

JukuG:

I’m personally against password crackers, yes, I’ve tried a couple and it takes too long so I quit. But I think it’s wrong to hijack another player, that’s right up there with identity theft.

If you think it’s wrong, why did you do it? Tried it, not worth it. If anyone has a password listed in the online simple password lists, the deserver their account to be cracked. As for me, my RuneScapes main account password is: 1h43ld3

I can tell you that because I havent logged on for a few months, and no one knows the name

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think it's right what Fagex is doing?

item.title: Do you think it's right what Fagex is doing?
item.dc:creator: @irfan786 irfan786
item.description:
@irfan786 wrote:

Im against it 100%, it’s one thing to crack autoer’s passwords, it’s another to crack legit’s.

item.title: Do you think it's right what Fagex is doing?
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

goatee:

Everyones saying it’s wrong but i bet they are all looking at Fagex for the password crackers. I know i am.

im not.

the only thing i ever tried in RS cheating was SCAR

Never tried Aryan, Sbot, Pass Cracking etc etc.

I think its the dumbest thing ever, and really horrible. Its one thing to auto for yourself, but to steal other peoples hard work… thats low

Read full topic
